original_text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east, and shineth even unto the west; so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
korean_text: 번개가 동편에서 나서 서편까지 번쩍임 같이 인자의 임함도 그러하리라

sentences.original_text: For as the lightning cometh out of the east,
and shineth even unto the west;
so shall also the coming of the Son of man be.
